Greek Yogurt, in-house made granola DF, Fresh berries
Energy Balls $30 per dozen
Chocolate Mint - Chocolate mint, raw cashews, cocoa powder, mejool dates, peppermint oil, ground flax seed, real maple syrup, sea salt
Banana Bread - Rolled oats, banana, almonds, pecans, real maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla, sea salt
Oatmeal Chocolate Chip - Rolled oats, real maple syrup, shredded coconut, almond butter, ground flaxseed, chocolate chips, vanilla, sea salt
Power Bowls (Minimum 2 of the same)
Served cold $18 each

Peanut Chicken
Brown or basmati rice, frilled chicken breast, red cabbage, shredded carrots, sliced bell peppers, chopped cucumbers, peanut sauce *DF
Greek Chicken
Brown or basmati rice, frilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumber, feta, Kalamata olives, red onion, in-house made Greek vinaigrette *DF
Taco Beef
Ground seasoned beef (or beef substitute), shredded cheddar, black beans, corn, chopped lettuce, diced peppers, salsa, sour cream, pickled jalapeno, lime
Veggie
Quinoa or rice, shredded carrots, edamame, roasted beets, roasted cauliflower, roasted zucchini, in-house made hummus
Meals (Minimum 2 of the same)
$25 each
Chicken souvlaki, lemon potatoes/basmati rice, roasted tomatoes, zucchini, red onions, feta, kalmata olives
Chicken Parmesan
Crispy breaded chicken breast, spicy penne, roasted seasonal veggies
Teriyaki Chicken
Marinated and grilled chicken breast, bell peppers zucchini, red onion, on bed of rice or noodles. *DF
Sticky Sesame Chicken
Ground chicken, sticky in-house made Asian sauce, steamed broccoli, bed of rice *DF
Butter Chicken
Slow cooked tender chicken breast, in a rich and creamy tomato based butter sauce (mild to medium heat), served on bed of rice with spinach
Best Ever Beef Lasagna
Braised ground beef and chorizo sausage, cheesy ricotta filling, loads of mozzarella and parmesan (serves 2)
Shepherd's Pie
Ground Beef, carrots, peas, tomato-based sauce, fresh herbs and mashed potato crust *DF
Orange Sesame Beef
Slow braised steak in sticky hoisin sauce, fresh oranges, sesame seeds, served on rice with steamed season veggies *DF
Pork Greek Ribs
Dry rubbed pork side ribs, with lemon roasted potatoes and Greek Salad *DF
Maple Mustard Pulled Pork
Juicy shred of pork seasoned with grainy mustard and real maple syrup. Served on a bed of mashed sweet potatoes, with seasonal steamed veggies.
Mashed sweet Add $2
BBQ Pork Ribs
Juicy, fall off the bone ribs, with Smokey BBQ sauce, corn on the cob (when in season), and herb roasted potatoes *DF
Greek Pork Souvlaki
Marinated, skewered and grilled, served with lemon potatoes or rice and seasonal frilled vegetables
Coconut Chickpea Curry
Indian inspired flavour, with coconut milk, chickpeas, spinach, cilantro and served on coconut rice. *DF
Veggies Lasagna
Extra cheesy with assortment of seasonal vegetables and afresh tomato sauce
Mushroom Risotto
Creamy mushroom risotto with parmesan and truffle oil, and a side of asparagus
Dijon Salmon
Baked salmon with creamy spread of garlic, parsley and Dijon. Served with white and wild rice and steamed seasonal vegetables. *DF
Maple Salmon
Baked salmon with real maple syrup glaze. Served with rice and seasonal steamed vegetables. *DF
Tuna Casserole
Old fashioned favourite. Tuna in a creamy cheese sauce with elbow macaroni, peas, celery and crunchy bread on top.
Soups
1 Litre $22
Carrot Ginger Soup
Carrots, fresh ginger, in-house made vegetable broth, garlic, onions, cinnamon
Broccoli Cheddar
Creamy soup with loads of broccoli, carrot sticks, celery and cheddar cheese
Chicken Noodle Soup
Roasted chicken, mirepoix, fresh ginger, Heartbeat Hot Sauce, chicken broth, rice noodles
Best Ever Lentil Soup
Dried lentils, roasted peppers, mirepoix, kale or spinach, tomatoes, fresh herbs, in-house made vegetable broth *DF
Salads
$30 each. Serves 4
Greek Salad
Romaine lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, feta, Kalamata olives, in-house made Greek dressing
Caesar Salad
Romaine Lettuce, crispy bacon, fresh grated parmesan, in-house made creamy garlic dressing
Italian Garden Salad
Mixed Greens, Roma tomatoes, in-house made croutons, pepperoncini, red onions, black olives, fresh grated parmesan, in-house made Italian vinaigrette
Buns and Breads
Pricing per dozen unless specified

name: Jennifer's Gluten-Free Kitchen
